This basic implementation just sets a binding on the targeted and returns the appropriate instance.
All this work is delegated to the decorated instance.

member.returns: True if the provider supports all that's needed.

This basic implementation just sets a binding on the targeted and returns the appropriate instance.
All this work is delegated to the decorated instance.
member.param: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.
member.returns: The object value to set on the property where the extension is applied. In case of a valid binding expression, this is a instance.

member.summary: A helper calss for visual tree crawling.

member.name: M:Topics.Radical.Windows.VisualTreeCrawler.IsChildOfType``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Determines whether the given dependency object is child of an object of the specified type T.
member.typeparam: The type of the parent object.
member.param: The obj to determine the parent type for.
member.returns: true if the given dependency object is child of an object of the specified type T; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Topics.Radical.Windows.VisualTreeCrawler.FindParent``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Finds, in the Visual Tree, the parent, of the given type T, of the given dependency object.
member.typeparam: The type of the searched parent.
member.param: The object where to start search.
member.returns: The found parent dependency object or null if none is of the given type T.

member.name: M:Topics.Radical.Windows.VisualTreeCrawler.FindParent``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Predicate{``0})
member.summary: Finds, in the Visual Tree, the parent, of the given type T, of the given dependency object that matches the given condition.
member.typeparam: The type of the searched parent.
member.param: The object where to start search.
member.returns: The found parent dependency object or null if none is of the given type T.

member.name: M:Topics.Radical.Windows.VisualTreeCrawler.FindChild``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Finds the child fo the givent type.
member.typeparam: The typeof the child to find.
member.returns: The found child if any; otherwise null.

member.name: M:Topics.Radical.Windows.VisualTreeCrawler.FindChild``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Predicate{``0})
member.summary: Finds the child fo the givent type.
member.typeparam: The typeof the child to find.
member.param: The filter to apply to determine if the found child satisfy the requirments of the caller.
member.returns: The found child if any; otherwise null.

member.name: M:Topics.Radical.Windows.LoadedWeakEventManager.StartListening(System.Object)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, starts listening for the event being managed. After is first called, the manager should be in the state of calling or whenever the relevant event from the provided source is handled.
member.param: The source to begin listening on.

member.name: M:Topics.Radical.Windows.LoadedWeakEventManager.StopListening(System.Object)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, stops listening on the provided source for the event being managed.
member.param: The source to stop listening on.
